channel.title: Port forward help
channel.description:
Hi, im having trouble portforwarding my linksys router with the tutorial in tutorial section.
It says i needa do Start>run>cmd and type in ipconfig...
But the thing is, is that im useing windows vista ultimate, and there is no run on the start menu... what do i do?

item.title: Port forward help
item.dc:creator: @mtompkin7225 mtompkin7225
item.description:
@mtompkin7225 wrote:

well
u go start>allprograms>accessories>and hit command prompt

Read full topic
